strings.Value: "Have you heard the garbage that the bards of Pitax are composing on Irovetti's orders? It's vile slander! And it's written so dreadfully!"
"So why don't you fight back? Or maybe I should be the court versemaker instead of you, ha ha! 'Irovetti, just in case, I will punch you in the face!'"
"When do you have time to read all that?"
"Fighting a war by the most underhanded methods, while avoiding honest battle — that's exactly his style."
"Let them write! Write it all! Then we steal aaaall their papers — and then we get their think-thoughts! Great plan, right?"
